alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 5:14PM CDT until August 26 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jefferson County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 513 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Waurika, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Observed wind report. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Waurika. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
